Package edu.ncsu.csc216.tracker.model

Class RequirementsList

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.tracker.model.RequirementsList
  • public class RequirementsList
extends java.lang.Object
    One of the classes responsible for managing the list of requirements. Has the add, get, and remove methods for requirements, in addition to being able to execute commands on a specific requirement in the list
    Author:
    Troy Boone

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RequirementsList()
      Constructs a list of requirements.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int addRequirement​(java.lang.String summary, java.lang.String acceptanceTestId)
      Simple add method.
      void addXMLReqs​(java.util.List<edu.ncsu.csc216.tracker.xml.Req> readerInport)
      Add method for existing requirements.
      void deleteRequirementById​(int reqId)
      Calls the getRequirementById method to find the requirement with matching ID, then calls ArrayList remove method to remove it from the list
      void executeCommand​(int reqId, Command c)
      Calls the getRequirementById method to find the requirement with matching ID, then using the update method to execute a command on the requirement
      Requirement getRequirementById​(int reqId)
      Iterates through requirements list and if a requirement has the same ID as the input, it is returned
      java.util.List<Requirement> getRequirements()
      Simple getter for requirements

    • Constructor Detail

      • RequirementsList

        public RequirementsList()
        Constructs a list of requirements. The counter for this list is set initially at 0

    • Method Detail

      • addRequirement

        public int addRequirement​(java.lang.String summary,
                          java.lang.String acceptanceTestId)
        Simple add method. Adds NEW requirements to the requirement list.
        Parameters:
        summary - the requirements summary
        acceptanceTestId - the requirements acceptanceTestId
        Returns:
        the index of the added object

      • addXMLReqs

        public void addXMLReqs​(java.util.List<edu.ncsu.csc216.tracker.xml.Req> readerInport)
        Add method for existing requirements. Will add requirements from an list of XML and will set the counter to 1 more then the highest requirement added
        Parameters:
        readerInport - the list of Req to be added

      • getRequirements

        public java.util.List<Requirement> getRequirements()
        Simple getter for requirements
        Returns:
        requirements list

      • getRequirementById

        public Requirement getRequirementById​(int reqId)
        Iterates through requirements list and if a requirement has the same ID as the input, it is returned
        Parameters:
        reqId - the reqId being looked for
        Returns:
        the requirement in the list with matching reqId, null otherwise

      • executeCommand

        public void executeCommand​(int reqId,
                           Command c)
        Calls the getRequirementById method to find the requirement with matching ID, then using the update method to execute a command on the requirement
        Parameters:
        reqId - the id of the requirement that the command is being executed on
        c - the command being executed

      • deleteRequirementById

        public void deleteRequirementById​(int reqId)
        Calls the getRequirementById method to find the requirement with matching ID, then calls ArrayList remove method to remove it from the list
        Parameters:
        reqId - the id of the requirement being removed
